sentences.en: But his supervisor was among those making the lewd and degrading comments.
sentences.cn: 但他的上司也是这些满口污言秽语的骚扰者之一,而人事经理也无能为力.

sentences.en: He gave her a lewd wink.
I think I can top that. Try getting thrown out of Disneyland for lewd behavior.
sentences.cn: 我想我比你还糗. 因为行为下流而被从迪斯尼里赶出来.

sentences.en: Lewd conduct is not appropriate behavior in the office.
sentences.cn: 猥亵行为在办公室是很不恰当的.

sentences.en: Speech in this circle, if not always decent , never became lewd.
sentences.cn: 这个圈子里的谈话, 即使不总是正经的, 也绝不会是下流的.

trans.tran_en: using rude words or movements that make you think of sex
